errors.notServerOwner: You are not the server owner, the owner is {usermention}!
errors.notDev: You must be a bot developer to use this command!
errors.normal: Something went wrong please try again later. If the issue persists, please join our support server!

bot.name: Nyxia
bot.desc: Nyxia is a versatile Discord bot that brings HD music, games, and powerful server management tools to your community. Whether you're looking to automate moderation, keep things fun with interactive activities, or streamline server organization, Nyxia has you covered. Plus, with a customizable economy and a dashboard on the way, there's plenty more to explore!
